Get the live Bitcoin / BTC to GBP price.

Automatically refreshes every 2 minutes.

Want the price of Bitcoin live in GBP/Pounds Sterling? This is the Chrome app for you.

Also includes price graphs of the last 24hrs from LocalBitcoins.com.

The app also includes BTC to USD (US Dollars).

Looking for a Chrome app that allows you to see a regular live updated price of Bitcoins in GBP / Pounds sterling? This is the app for you!
